headline: Flights OF Fantasy
excerpt: There’s primeval magic in ordinary fashions.
content:
PHOTOGRAPHY By Keith Carter

Beaumont photographer Keith Carter, known for his intense black and white portraits, takes a turn at fashion photography in the swamps of the Big Thicket for a moody and mysterious view of everyday wear. White knit bicycle pants with lace trim by LA Movers, at Macy's, Galleria, Houston; $16.97. White knit camisole by Charter Club, at Macy's; $16. Opposite: Cotton knit dress with razor straps by David Fehnel, at Dream Merchant, Houston; $102. Earrings, at arte, Houston; $60. Wings of the Dove, by Marilyn Lanfear, San antonio, courtesy of Lynne Goode Gallery, Houston.

Black leather motorcycle jacket by London Leather Connection, at Dream Merchant; $185. T-shirt by Jockey, at Macy's; $13 (package of three). Black leather belt with bullets by Dangerous Threads, at Dream Merchant; $58. Pewter-and-copper amulet by Contempo Casuals, Houston; $11.50. Silver skeleton earring by Miles Harden, at Selections, Beaumont, and Torchy's, Beaumont; $78. Opposite: Washed-linen shirt by Café, at Cotton Club Men, Houston; $70. Denim jeans by Gapkids; $22.

Ribbed knit jumpsuit by Radio, at In-Wear Matinique, Houston; $42. Watch by Ecclissi, at Cotton Club; $236. Necklace by anni and Co., at Cotton Club; $114. Opposite: Polka-dot rayon vest, at Step Back, Houston; $20. Silver snake belt, at Eve France, Houston; $265. Jeans by Chevignon, at Cotton Club Men, Houston; $98.

Black stretch-vinyl dress by Lip Service, at Dream Merchant; $75. Leather bra by Lust, NY, at Dream Merchant; $36. Pewter earrings by Banana Bob, at Dream Merchant; $35. Opposite: Cotton eyelet dress from India, at Cotton Club; $222. Mother-of-pearl earrings, at arté; $78. While knit tights by azzura Basics, at Cotton Club; $44. Stylist, Janice Blue; location assistants, Pat Carter and John Fulbright.
